channel.title: Github on Steve Good
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Steve Good

item.title: Moving to GitHub Pages
item.description: Ghost + Pivotal CF = <3 Last year I moved my blog to Ghost and hosted it in Pivotal CF. This has been great so far but I’m starting to get twitchy about paying for an application to be running in PCF when I rarely update anything. This is my response to that concern. GitHub Pages There are a number of advantages to using GitHub Pages over a blogging application but for the most part I really like the price.
